|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = 650 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = Compex bootloader;;; |stockos = CompexWRT;;; |exp_if_types = Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 12-24 |pwr_poe_amp = |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, |jtag = yes,, |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Compex |manuf_model = WPJ531LV |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/20/2015 |estreldate = 12/2014 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Product highlights=== *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz ([[MIPS 24Kc]]) CPU *64MB System Memory, 16MB NOR Flash *On-board 2.4GHz max 23dBm output power (per chain) *IEEE 802.11n compliant & backward compatible with 802.11b/g *2x2 On-board radio up to 300Mbps physical data rate *1x Mini PCI Express Slot at 9.2mm height *2x FE LAN (RJ45) with Auto-MDI/X *Passive 24V Power Over Ethernet *Integrated 48V 802.3af available as option ===Applications=== *Dual band 802.11a/b/g/n or 802.11ac/n Access Point *Single band 802.11b/g/n or 802.11a/n Access Point *Point-to-Point and Point-to-Multipoint Wireless Bridge *Wireless Base Station *Wireless Customer-Premises Equipment (CPE) *Support for Third Party 3G/LTE Radio Module ====Ordering Configuration==== 
Item Code		        Chipset	               Board Information
WPJ531LV-A 6A06PCW16F-BR-BP1	QCA9531	    2x2 802.11n 2.4GHz SoC radio with MiniPCIe slot
